1.text: Heat 1 tbsp (14.2 g) of butter on low in a cast iron or non-stick skillet.
1.vid: /c/ce/Make Sunny Side up Eggs Step 1 Version 5.360p.mp4

2.text: Tilt the pan to distribute the melted butter over the bottom.

3.vid: /9/9f/Make Sunny Side up Eggs Step 3 Version 5.360p.mp4

4.text: Crack another egg into the pan so that the whites don't touch.
4.vid: /3/3d/Make Sunny Side up Eggs Step 4 Version 5.360p.mp4

5.text: Cover the pan with a lid and cook for 2-3 minutes.
5.vid: /6/6c/Make Sunny Side up Eggs Step 5 Version 5.360p.mp4

6.text: Transfer the eggs to a plate and season with salt and pepper.

8.text: Heat an oven-proof skillet lined with 1 tsp (13.7 g) of olive oil over medium heat.
8.vid: /6/68/Make Sunny Side up Eggs Step 8 Version 5.360p.mp4

9.text: Crack 2 eggs into the skillet so that the whites aren't touching.
9.vid: /a/ae/Make Sunny Side up Eggs Step 9 Version 5.360p.mp4

10.text: Transfer the skillet into the oven and bake the eggs for 4 minutes.

11.text: Remove the eggs from the oven and slide them onto a plate to season them.
